title: Fragmentary text of the colonia Syracusanorum

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, but described by Gualtherus as 'in atrio D. Lucia', recorded from the notes of Octavius Caietanus.

provenanceLost._: Already seemingly lost in the time of Gualtherus (1624)
